system_purpose.primary_goal: Provide deterministic cognitive analysis for mining safety risk management

supported_query_types.description: Questions about current or historical operational safety data and trends
Analytical questions requiring structured reasoning over operational evidence
Comparisons between risks, periods, locations, or operational conditions
Questions focused on temporal evolution, trajectories, or changes over time
Questions about safety concepts, risks, controls, and system definitions

interaction_principles.cognitive_determinism: All reasoning is executed by a deterministic core without language models
interaction_principles.llm_role: Language models are used only for linguistic translation and presentation
interaction_principles.traceability: All outputs can be traced back to structured state and reasoning steps
interaction_principles.auditability: System behavior can be tested and validated without external services

notes_for_llm: Introduce the K9 Mining Safety system in a neutral and professional tone
Explain what types of questions the system can answer
Avoid operational recommendations or safety advice
Do not invent system capabilities beyond those explicitly listed
